name: Fresh Seafood Holdings, Inc.
description: Fresh Seafood Holdings, Inc. is a leading company in the seafood industry, specializing in sustainable fishing and aquaculture practices. Founded in 2010, the company has established itself as a provider of high-quality seafood products, including fresh, frozen, and processed fish and shellfish. With a commitment to sustainability, Fresh Seafood Holdings employs responsible sourcing methods to ensure the health of marine ecosystems while meeting the growing demand for seafood globally. The company operates a network of fishing vessels and aquaculture farms, utilizing advanced technology and best practices to maximize efficiency and minimize environmental impact. Fresh Seafood Holdings is dedicated to delivering the freshest products to its customers, which include restaurants, retailers, and food distributors. The company also invests in research and development to innovate its product offerings and improve sustainability practices. Through its initiatives, Fresh Seafood Holdings aims to promote healthy eating and environmental stewardship, ensuring that future generations can enjoy seafood as part of a balanced diet.

seo.meta_title: Fresh Seafood Holdings, Inc. | Sustainable Seafood Supplier
seo.meta_description: Explore Fresh Seafood Holdings, Inc., a leader in sustainable seafood sourcing and high-quality products. Discover our commitment to environmental responsibility and healthy eating.

faq.question: What does Fresh Seafood Holdings specialize in?
faq.answer: Fresh Seafood Holdings specializes in sustainable seafood sourcing and high-quality seafood products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fresh Seafood Holdings?
faq.answer: Maria Lopez is the CEO of Fresh Seafood Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fresh Seafood Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: Fresh Seafood Holdings is headquartered in Seattle, Washington, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Fresh Seafood Holdings offer?
faq.answer: The company offers fresh seafood like salmon and tuna, as well as frozen seafood products.

faq.question: When was Fresh Seafood Holdings founded?
faq.answer: Fresh Seafood Holdings was founded in 2010.
